mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_reply(rno, content, author, password, ano) VALUES(t_reply_no_seq.nextval, #{content}, #{author}, #{password}, #{ano})
mapper.select: SELECT content, author, createdAt FROM t_reply WHERE ano=#{ano}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_reply SET content=#{content}, author=#{author} WHERE ano=#{ano} AND password=#{password}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_reply WHERE ano=#{ano} AND password=#{password}
